attributes.action: Boys to be allowed to join Rainbows, Brownies  (the Girl  Guides)
attributes.background: Girls can join Scouts so boys should be allowed to join the Girl Guides. Joining these organisations should be based on what children enjoy doing and not based on gender, please support this.

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of Girlguiding, a charity, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about Girlguiding, including how to contact them to make this suggestion, here:

https://www.girlguiding.org.uk/
